short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Reddit experience with bulk delete, auto-folding comments, image viewing, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

Auto Fold Child Comments
- Automatically collapses on load, allowing you to manually control collapsing and expanding Reddit child comments.

Reddit image viewer
- Open the image in a new tab and redirect to preview.redd.it when clicked.

Reddit bulk deleter
- Delete all reddit comments with one click.

More features
- Currently in developmentâ€¦

How to Use:
1. Install the extension.
2. Click on the extension icon in the top right of the browser.
3. Select the features you want to enable or disable from the menu.

Perfect for:
- Reddit power users
- Reddit moderators
- Regular Redditors looking to optimize their browsing

FAQ:
Q1: Can I mass delete Reddit comments history at once?
A: Yes, our extension allows you to bulk delete all your Reddit comments with just one click.

Q2: Is this extension safe to use?
A: Absolutely. This add-on does not collect data and respects users' privacy.

Q3:Why open preview.redd.it in a new tab for Reddit image previews?
A:
Compatibility: Reddit pages may sometimes resize or compress images. Opening preview.redd.it in a new tab ensures you see the image in its original resolution.
Loading Speed: preview.redd.it is specifically designed for image previews, so opening it in a new tab often results in faster loading times and better image quality.

Q4:Does this extension support old.reddit.com?
A:The extension does not support old.reddit.com. It is designed to work with the new Reddit.
